title: How to Make Octopus Slime

steps.headline: Mix 1 cup of light clay and 2 tablespoons (29.6 ml) of lotion.
steps.description: Add them into a bowl and stir until the lotion is fully absorbed into the light clay. This may take a while. Knead it with your hands to speed up the process.

steps.headline: Get 2 tablespoons of slime base and add that into a separate bowl.
steps.description: Mix 1/2 teaspoons of toothpaste or mint facial wash and stir until combined. You can also try using Vaseline Cool Men's for a better minty coolness.

steps.headline: Mix 1/2 teaspoon of glue and 2 to 4 drops of food coloring into a cup and mix together.
Add 1 small pump of foaming soap into the glue mixture and stir until smooth.
steps.description: At this point, you can add glitter, beads, etc into your glue mixture for fun.

steps.headline: Add the glue mixture into the light clay mixture and knead until the light clay feels lightly sticky.
Add the slime base mixture and knead until it's smooth and does not feel sticky anymore.
Add a very small amount of shaving cream into your slime.
steps.description: Knead it and store in to fridge for 3 days.
